content: usher in the holiday season with the christmas star ornament on your tree worked with number 3 cotton thread and d/3 25mm hook this delicate ornament is a classic addition to any decor finished ornament measures 3 5 inches across and 4 5 inches long or if you prefer a smaller size work the same pattern with number 10 thread and a 1 75mm hook for a finished ornament that is 2 25 inches across and 3 inches long free pattern available on the blog with downloadable pdf and full youtube video tutorials for both left and right handed crocheters requires blocking after crocheting to maintain shape while hanging
